file_content.text: Major? It's me. It looks like we're in the clear.
I... first of all, thank you. For rescuing me. I know it probably wasn't an easy choice to make.
Choices like this are never easy to make.
This was very hard.
I--I'm sorry. When I broke out, I just followed my training. I never expected this.
You're always first in my mind, Jaxo.
I never realized. I mean, we've had some fun times, but... I didn't know.
I had no idea. You never seemed to be very interested in me.
It's better if we just put this behind us.
Don't think about it.
I'm trying. I really am.
Three hundred and fourteen lives. Make them count, Jaxo.
You have a lot to make up for.
I will. I'm going to try, at least.
All those men and women. Their families, their children... I don't know what to do with myself.
I'm sure Garza would grant you leave after what you've been through.
Take some time off.
I don't know if I should be going on vacation in the middle of a war.
Meet me at your place on Coruscant. We'll forget about war for a while.
Uh... no, I... I think I need some time.
If you need anything, you can always call.
Can I help?
No, no. You've got enough on your plate as it is.
We're soldiers. Stick to soldiering and forget everything else.
Pull yourself together!
Yeah. The galaxy won't stop just because we want it to.
I'll get through this. You should get in touch with Garza so you can get back to work.
I'll keep in touch. Jaxo out.
Stay safe, Major. Jaxo out.
I'll fly out on the transport--we'd better hurry!
Let's go, let's go!
Thank you. Thank you so much. I couldn't die here.
This place won't last much longer. Let's go.
We'd better move out.
I'd do anything to save you, Jaxo.
I... we should go. There isn't much time.
SpecForce troopers have to look out for each other.
I've got your back.
Yeah. I guess we do. Let's get out of here.
No one can know what really happened here. Got it?
Never tell anyone about this.
I won't tell. Let's go, please.
I'll follow you.
I'd call that a beachhead. But you'd better leave plenty of muscle behind--your ship is going to be target number one for those droids.
My squad will hold this position. What's next?
Copy that.
Those droids won't put a scratch on my ship.
Bring 'em on.
Let's hope not. It's a long walk home.
I'll handle the tactical assessments. Just tell me where to go.
Tell me something useful.
Next up is the command center. That's where you'll need to go to open all of the cells.
Once our boys are loose, they can ride out in one of the old supply transports. It'll be a tight fit, but I doubt anyone will complain.
Let's make it happen.
Sounds good to me.
How are you getting out of here, Jaxo?
What about you?
I can take care of myself, don't worry. I'll rendezvous with the others and help them get the transport out of here.
Much as I'd like to ride out with you, I think I'd better help the others get that transport running.
Don't try anything fancy, Jaxo. Let me handle this.
Stay out of trouble.
No problem. I've done everything I can do anyway.
Good luck, Major.
Havoc Squad calling Sergeant Jaxo. Come in, Jaxo.
After all these hours, I'd be happy to see anybody's face. But you just made my decade.
I couldn't leave you hanging, could I?
Happy to oblige.
I knew there was a reason you were always my favorite.
You always did before. Maybe I should've gotten myself into trouble a long time ago.
It's you. It's really you. I must've done something right.
We're set for a rapid approach vector. What's your plan?
Let's get this op started.
I'm glad you're hanging in there, Jaxo.
It's good to see you.
Yeah. Just barely.
I didn't come here for a chat, Jaxo.
Don't waste time.
Good, then I didn't spend all of this time wedged into a crawlspace for nothing.
From here, I can short out the exterior defense grid. You'll be able to coast right in. But internal security is a whole other problem.
We've got war droids, and plenty of 'em. There's going to be some major heat after you touch down, believe me.
Thanks for the heads-up, Jaxo.
Understood.
Anything you can do to cut the droids down a bit?
Can you thin their numbers?
No such luck. Everything on the inside is independent--no big red button to push. Sorry.
Is the droid army my only problem, or is there more?
What are you getting me into?
I haven't found anything else--and believe me, I've had time to look. No booby traps, no self-destruct switches... just droids.
You'd better make your approach now--I'll contact you once you're landed. Jaxo out.
I'd do anything for you.
I'd do anything for you.
[Flirt] Let me help.
[Flirt] Let me help.
You're all I care about.
You're all I care about.
